name: -webkit-tap-highlight-color
description: Overrides the highlight color shown when the user taps a link or a JavaScript clickable element in Safari on iPhone.
longDescription: This property obeys the alpha value, if specified. If you donâ€™t specify an alpha value, Safari on iPhone applies a default alpha value to the color. To disable tap highlighting, set the alpha value to 0 (invisible). If you set the alpha value to 1.0 (opaque), the element is not visible when tapped.
